document_data.caption: A map showing Satchel Alley and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Satchel Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Satchel Alley''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Satchel Alley was located in the western section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The alley cut diagonally in between [[Westwall Street]] and [[Diamond Street]].
document_data.History: The alley was named for the bags of valuables that jewelers used to carry through here before lurking [[thieves]] made it too risky.
